javadoc:
Abstract class for a GUI panel that allows the user to select choices for 
 resolving conflicts.

methods.name: allChoicesAreResolved
methods.comment:
Returns whether or not all of the choices (conflicts) have been resolved
 by the user making selections.

return.comment: true if all conflicts are resolved.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the number of conflicts that have currently been resolved in this GUI component.
@return the number resolved.
methods.name: getNumConflictsResolved
methods.comment: Returns the number of conflicts that have currently been resolved in this GUI component.

methods.name: allChoicesAreSame
methods.comment:
Returns whether or not all of the choices (conflicts) have been resolved
 by the user making selections and the user made the same choice for all the conflicts.

return.comment: true if all conflicts are resolved the same.

name: ChoiceComponent
comment:
Abstract class for a GUI panel that allows the user to select choices for 
 resolving conflicts.
